Comment: ​President Trump's renewed immigration crackdown has led to significant human consequences across the United States. Since January 20, over 32,800 migrants have been detained, including 1,800 students whose visas were revoked. These actions have raised concerns about arbitrary enforcement and disregard for legal protections .​
